nodes.title: Moved the FAB to the list fragment.
Restored fragment container to be a LinearLayout
Move Signup Prompt to Nav Drawer
Updated to latest simperium, and bumped version codes.
Replaces old widgets in favor of Design Library versions
Updates app to use latest pin lock library.
Enable exception reporting in the analytics tracker.
Adjusts padding for tag header, so it's easier to tap 'Edit tags'.
Ensure that getSelectedTag() doesn't return a null TagMenuItem.
Limit the size of the content string in `updateTitleAndPreview()`.
AppCompat v21 Integration and Material Design
Updates analytics to use new library included in Google Play Services
Use Simperium 0.4.11 from the shiny new maven central repo.
Prevent lag in action bar when drawer is toggled
Updating Source Sans Pro font to latest release.
Remove unneeded tools directive from manifest
Mark notes as deleted outside of the loop that gets the items at the checked list positions.
Converted AsyncTasks that were still using `execute()` to `executeOnExec...
Because two Simplenotes are better than one
Android Wear/Google Voice 'Take a note' support
Set NotesActivity to run as a single task
Save note after receiving a remote change
Moved note load to onCreateView() to prevent 'losing' note content if us...
Add version number and build info to settings screen
Adds multi-window support on compatible Samsung devices.
Add links when the note loads or saves instead of every time the text changes
Fix lost changes when switching away from note editor
Rename test folder to androidTest for gradle 0.9
Don't show "Empty Trash" icon when no items in Trash
Remember active list when returning to Notes List
Fix actionBar button delay when switching views.
Use a language code blacklist to load the default font instead of Source Sans Pro
Catch a NPE to fix strange crash issue with Samsung devices, #154.
Handle out of bounds offset indices
Use url encoded tag names for tag keys
Clear drawer selection if the user is logged out
Use latest simperium with merge features
Unit tests and additional fix for wrong cursor while searching
Fixes unwanted return of contextual action bar when on a landscape tablet.
Non-search cursors crash when return after search applied
Keep a list of all added spans added in MatchOffsetHighlighter
Set up to use Android Studio and Gradle
Search: Scroll to first match in the note editor
Search: Fix within-word search using like query fallback
Update Simperium to Fix Case-Insensitive UTF Search
add  new preference option: character count instead word count on note info
Fix new and empty notes from not deleting properly
Added a sidebar tab to view untagged notes.
Added keep screen on while editing in setting preference.
Fix notes list content preview line length in on Oreo
Add right-click popup menu to the notes list
Fix loss of selected note when switching to/from tablet mode on Chrome OS
Revert right click to start multi select
Replace markdown icon and move to the left
Fix key navigation from note editor to tags field.
Use Higher Font Size Values for Large and High DPI Screens
Fixing Window Resize Issues on Chrome OS
Disable monospace option for next release
Use dynamic copyright date in about fragment
Added a warning when signing out with unsynced notes.
Fix line height squashing in editor
Only update the markdown view if markdown is enabled for the note
Fixing build for latest version of gradle
New Feature: Add App shortcut for api 25 and above
Fix NPE when callbacks attempt to load markdown in the wrong view.
Update build config to use dev app and key
Update build instructions to use dev app and key
Swap the position of the pin and trash note icons in multi select.
Enforce Sign in but allow previous offline users to still use the app
Updating to the latest Android dependencies.
Add crashlytics to track eventual crashes in the app
Added `windowLightStatusBar` settings for light and dark theme.
Stop Buckets after App goes to Background
Update Library to Passcode Lock v1.5.1
Travis config + Fix release build by using an old version of the gradle android plugin
Fill Viewport with Input Text Box in Edit Tab
New and modified features (Notes colorizing, reminder, templates, todo lists, improved tag search, bug fixes)
Update Library to Passcode Lock v1.5.0
Update Library to Passcode Lock v1.4.0
Material Design for settings screen on pre-Lollipop devices
Account for Font Size Setting in Markdown Preview
Make font size setting work in Markdown preview
Editor: Add Back `lineSpacingExtra` for better line spacing
Update welcome note text, as there is not actually a pencil icon

Update List Margin and Normal Font Size
Updated translations, and a beta version name update.
Fixes PIN Lock Bypass from Google Now
Add launcher icon for debug builds
Ensure some strings won't be translated
Show note date when browsing history
Clear the focus of the edit text when showing the history view.
Bugfix: Correct "Restore note" icon is now being shown in markdown preview of deleted notes
Note counts for tags with uppercase letters are now shown correctly
Add translations for release notes and metadata
Full screen note editing on tablets while on landscape orientation
Add Setting for Preview Mode First
Add Travis CI build status badge to README
Use Unicode No-Break Space to Prevent Checklist Span Break
Use Status Bar Height as Padding Instead of Static Value
Fix SimplenoteMovementMethod from clearing the selection
Fixes crash when tapping on a very specific point next to a checkbox.
Avoid setting the selection to negative index
Adding length checks to prevent OutOfIndexExceptions.
Fix arrow key navigation in note editor
Update Markdown Parser to Support Checklists
New Tracks Event for Checklist Button
WIP: Run tests on Travis CI
Bugfix. Dark theme is now correctly applied in bottom sheets
Bugfixes. Markdown rendering is now correctly working for **Dark at night only** theme
Sensitive content is now hidden from the recent apps when app lock is enabled
Adding new setting that will sort the tags list alphabetically
Cleanup for misc inspection errors and warnings.
Fix leaky async for save note task.
Fix leaky async for loading note task.
Fix leaky async used by Wear create note.
Add a bottom padding to notes list so that all note rows can be fully visualized
Added the option **Dark at night only** to the themes to use the Dark theme when it is night and the Light one when it is daytime
